attributes.action: Establish a Found for Polish Army ex-servicemans and theirs ancestors who fought under British Command as Polish Army in during WWII
attributes.additional_details: Polish soldiers who fought on air sea and field with West Allies was abandoned in UK after war as effect of treasons in Tehran Yalta and Potsdam You can read one of a books as Abandoned Legion Michael Hope      Some of Polish soldiers was left without help and illusion from British authority some was pressed by this to back to Poland in many circumstances they was forgotten and left on grace of communist who sent them to prisons  Part of responsibility by signing this treaty remining always on British side I asking to create found or donate already existing founds like 5 Polish Field Infantry Division which run out of money today You remember only about Polish airmans but it wasn't only theirs They fought everywhere Please also remember about them today
